bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for the Maintenance of Industrial and Commercial Power Systems
IEEE Recommended Practice for the Maintenance of Industrial and Commercial Power Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This recommended practice covers the maintenance of industrial and commercial power systems. It covers the fundamentals of electrical equipment maintenance, how to develop successful maintenance strategies, and the common testing methods used as part of an electrical equipment maintenance program.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: failure effect; failure mode; failure modes and effects analysis; failure modes
and criticality analysis; hidden/latent failure; maintenance; predictive maintenance; preventive maintenance; probability; reliability; reliability-centered maintenance; safety-related work practices
